title: Shoes company marketing website with product catalog and contact form

requirements.text: Create a responsive shoes company website with the following pages and navigation: Home, Shop (product listing), Product Details, About, and Contact.

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation is present on all pages and works without full page reloads.
Layout is responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Home, Shop, Product Details, About, and Contact routes/pages are accessible and render meaningful content.

requirements.text: Define and apply a coherent visual theme for the entire website (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a modern premium footwear brand feel using warm neutrals (e.g., cream/sand), charcoal/black, and a single accent color (e.g., terracotta). Avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent typography, color palette, button styles, and spacing scale.
Primary UI elements (header, sections, cards, buttons, forms) match the selected theme across the site.
No blue/purple is used as the primary brand palette (unless only present inside product photos).

requirements.text: Implement a Shop page that displays a grid of shoes with search and filtering (at minimum: category and price range) and sorting (at minimum: price low-to-high and high-to-low).

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Shop page shows a product grid with image, name, price, and category.
Search filters products by name (case-insensitive).
Category filter and price range filter narrow the product list.
Sorting changes product ordering appropriately.
Filtering/sorting works with data returned from the backend.

requirements.text: Implement a Product Details page that shows product images, name, price, description, available sizes, and a clear call-to-action button (e.g., “Add to Cart” or “Inquire”).

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a product from the Shop page navigates to its Product Details page.
Product Details shows at least one image, name, price, description, and a selectable size list.
CTA button is present and visibly styled; if cart is not implemented, the CTA triggers a non-persistent UI action (e.g., opens an inquiry modal or shows a confirmation toast).

requirements.text: Add backend support for a public product catalog: store products in stable state in the single Motoko main actor and expose query methods to list products and fetch a product by ID (including fields needed for Shop filters/sort and Product Details). Seed the catalog with a small set of sample shoe products.

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides a query to return a list of products with IDs and required metadata (name, price, category, image paths, description, sizes).
Backend provides a query to fetch a single product by ID.
At least 6 sample products are available after deployment without requiring manual initialization steps.

requirements.text: Create a Contact page with a form (name, email, message) that submits to the backend and stores submissions in stable state; show a success and error state in the UI.

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields before submit.
On successful submission, the user sees a clear success confirmation and the form resets.
On failure, the user sees a clear error message.
Backend stores contact submissions (timestamped) in stable state.

requirements.text: Create an About page with brand story sections (e.g., Craft, Materials, Sustainability) and a simple timeline or values list suitable for a premium shoe company.

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: About page contains at least 3 distinct content sections and reads as a coherent shoe brand story.
Content layout is responsive and matches the site’s theme.

requirements.text: Use React Query for frontend data fetching/caching for the product catalog and contact submission; ensure loading and empty states are handled for Shop and Product Details.

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Shop page shows a loading state while products load and an empty state when no products match filters.
Product Details page shows a loading state and a clear not-found state for invalid IDs.
Data fetching uses React Query (queries/mutations) rather than ad-hoc fetch state.

requirements.text: Add a footer with key links (Shop, About, Contact), basic company info, and social link placeholders (no external API integration required).

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all pages and matches the theme.
Footer includes at least 3 internal links and basic company text.
Social links are present as placeholders (e.g., icons/labels) and do not require external API calls.

requirements.text: Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (logo, hero, and product images). Do not serve generated images from the backend.

quotes: Please create a shoes company website

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the frontend via static paths.
Home page uses the hero image and logo.
Shop/Product Details use the product images from the generated assets.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: E-commerce checkout, payments, and order fulfillment.
Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported, but not required for this build).
External CMS or external database integrations.
